title: The Decline of Grammar -  rhetorical strategy

content.question: Part of the speaker's rhetorical strategy in paragraph 1 is to

choices.label: discredit invalid views on the topic
alarm the reader about the nature of the controversy
enumerate the standards according to which appraisals will be made
convince the reader of the importance of the issue

content.answer: discredit invalid views on the topic
